channel.title: How can i make my client read npc ids?
channel.description:
*Note: I have a understanding of java I have self taught myself how it works for 2 years*
At the moment my client only read the npc index and not the ID/type. Any information would be helpful.
Right now my Auto-fighter only attacks one npc.
